news.title: BBC apologises to Trump over Panorama edit but refuses to pay compensation
news.summary: Lawyers for the US president have threatened to sue the corporation for $1bn (Â£759m).

news.title: Doctors to begin five-day walkout in England
news.summary: NHS bosses say they are aiming to keep nearly all services running during the strike.

news.title: Councils warn of 'total collapse' in special needs system
news.summary: The government is facing political pressure as it tries to reform the "broken" system of support for children with special educational needs.

news.title: Mahmood expected to adopt 'temporary stays only' rule for successful asylum seekers
news.summary: The Home Secretary is expected to announce asylum seekers can only stay in the UK temporarily.

news.title: TikTok award winner Max: 'It takes me hours to make the content you scroll on the toilet'
news.summary: Max Klymenko won creator of the year while Bemi Orojuogun, better known as bus aunty, won video of the year.

news.title: 'I could hardly walk' - the issue that affects one in five mums
news.summary: Two mothers who experienced pelvic girdle pain say being aware of the risk will help people seek treatment.

news.title: Watch: Blue Origin rocket successfully lands booster for first time
news.summary: Jeff Bezos' space company saw its first successful return landing of a reusable booster - a feat that SpaceX pioneered.

news.title: Israel confirms identity of hostage body returned by Hamas as Meny Godard
news.summary: Godard was 73 when he was killed during Hamas's raid on kibbutz Be'eri on 7 October 2023.

news.title: Ex-Bangladesh leader tells BBC she's not guilty of crimes against humanity
news.summary: Sheikh Hasina tells the BBC her trial in absentia is destined to deliver a "pre-ordained guilty verdict".

news.title: The TikTok mum helping others from her son's hospital bedside
news.summary: Kirsty Grandison is using social media to share her experience of caring for her severely brain damaged son.
